Running command: python3 - << 'PY'
from pathlib import Path
p = Path('/workspace/reproduce_issue.py')
s = p.read_text()
s2 = s.replace("parents[1] / 'matplotlib'", "parent / 'matplotlib'")
if s==s2:
    print('No change needed')
else:
    p.write_text(s2)
    print('Updated reproduce_issue.py')
PY

args.command:
python3 - << 'PY'
from pathlib import Path
p = Path('/workspace/reproduce_issue.py')
s = p.read_text()
s2 = s.replace("parents[1] / 'matplotlib'", "parent / 'matplotlib'")
if s==s2:
    print('No change needed')
else:
    p.write_text(s2)
    print('Updated reproduce_issue.py')
